name: Gimmick in the Chaos Dimension
storyline:
OUR HEROINE, GIMMICK, MUST NAVIGATE THE CHAOS DIMENSION FOR HER GRADUATE THESIS!
HELP GIMMICK COLLECT AS MUCH DATA AS POSSIBLE WITHOUT GETTING KICKED OUT OF THE CHAOS WORLD.

NAVIGATE AN EVER-CHANGING MAZE, AVOIDING ENEMIES, AND COLLECT POWERUPS TO UNLOCK AND UPGRADE GIMMICK'S SKILLS!
ONLY WITH ENOUGH DATA WILL GIMMICK PASS HER THESIS AND GRADUATE! WILL YOU HELP?
summary: A maze runner with a procedurally generated maze, upgradeable powerups, and unlockable cosmetics. Guide Gimmick as she gathers data for her graduate thesis about the mysterious chaos dimension.
